events.message: The candidate, John Doe, has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position through our careers portal.
John's application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department due to his experience in software development.
Recruiter Sarah Thompson has been assigned to manage the hiring process for John Doe's application for the software engineering role.
An initial phone screening was conducted with John to discuss his experience, skills in software development, and his motivation for the role.
John responded promptly confirming his availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
The technical interview with John has been scheduled for April 17th at 2 PM to evaluate his software engineering skills.
John completed a thorough technical interview demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability relevant to our engineering team.
HR interview was scheduled for John on April 20th to discuss company culture, benefits, and align expectations.
John had a positive HR interview experience, expressing his enthusiasm for the company and understanding of the role's expectations.
An official offer was proposed to John including salary, benefits, and onboarding plans tailored for his software engineering position.
John provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join our engineering team upon acceptance.
John officially accepted the offer and confirmed his start date, excited to begin his career as a software engineer with us.
John's onboarding process kicked off with orientation sessions, access to engineering tools, and team introductions.
The hiring process for John has been successfully completed, officially welcoming him as a new software engineer on the team.
